layout.singingstanza: Draw me, Lord; Lest these earth -- ly cares con -- sume My driv -- en soul. Move me Lord; As a cours -- ing riv -- er turns With -- in Thine hands. Draw me, Lord! Draw me, Lord!

lyrics.stanza: Draw me, Lord! Draw me, Lord!
Capture me; Be the conqueror of this Wild, charging mare. Win me Lord, And subdue all pow'r of self To yield to Thee.
